statements: SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE contact_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE contact_email LIKE '%google%' ORDER BY vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%Tech%' OR vendor_name LIKE '%GmbH%';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id > 3 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%555%' AND vendor_name LIKE 'A%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL AND contact_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT vendor_name, contact_phone FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'Tech Solutions' ORDER BY contact_phone ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_name FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_name, email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%tech%';
SELECT accessory_id, accessory_name, vendor_name FROM accessories INNER JOIN vendors ON accessories.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_name FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(accessory_id) AS total_accessories FROM vendors LEFT JOIN accessories ON vendors.vendor_id = accessories.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING total_accessories > 0;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_name, address, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT acc_id, acc_name, vendor_id FROM accessories ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM relationships WHERE vendor_id = 2 AND acc_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT acc_name, vendors.vendor_name FROM accessories INNER JOIN vendors ON accessories.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id;
SELECT acc_name, vendor_name FROM accessories LEFT JOIN vendors ON accessories.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id WHERE acc_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendors.vendor_name, count(*) as num_accessories FROM accessories INNER JOIN vendors ON accessories.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id GROUP BY vendors.vendor_name ORDER BY num_accessories DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT products.product_name, vendors.vendor_name, products.price FROM products JOIN vendors ON products.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id WHERE products.price > 50;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, orders.total_price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.vendor_id ORDER BY orders.total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM Vendors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM Vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name;
